response.value:
The main idea of report the most popular transportation for students are bike and train which both have their own advantages and disadvantages.

The most affordable transportation for students is absolutely bike. There is nothing comparable with bike for such an eco-friendly transportation for environment and good for owner's health. Since students usually have tiny budget for living, to having bike is the best option without fill gas, paying other fees once bike was bought. Although after having long road bicycling, this cause sweatiness because of physical active movement like running. This might not suitable for having such a wet or smelly clothes in everyday or being ready for your next special location such as part -time job, classes, presentation day, celebrating spot, date etc.., with changing cloth. Except this, there is troublesome reason do not even caused by bikers which is bike theft. They are everywhere even you lock down your bike or placed on bike station, unless carry on inside your house or somewhere around on your eye.

The second popular transport is train which good option for everybody. The train has automate power of speed which can easily calculate duration of the destinations because it is mechanical technique transport. So, the biggest advantage is probably speed but during rush hour .It has price for every usage.

To sum up, all these good and bad reasons can effect for individual's decision to choosing their transportation usage type in daily. I personally would recommend student should pick one which is suitable on student's situation such as how far the distances between school, home or student's often visited spots, how is weather in living area, how safe place student living.
